TopicTitle: Looking for good heavy lifter engines like those in B9

Articles.Content: Well, since the bug that causes problems with the B9 heavy lifter engines hasn't been fixed yet and I want some heavy lifter engines, so, what mods have good heavy lifter engines with similar power as the ones in B9?

I would recommend the 5 meter parts from KW Rocketry or Novapunch. Or, if you want an entire suite of parts, look no further than Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems, which includes everything you need for a constellation mission.

Hope this helps, Delter.
KW Rocketry hasn't been updated to 0.90 yet though. I guess I can check out the chaka monkey thing.

KW Rocketry hasn't been updated to 0.90 yet though. I guess I can check out the chaka monkey thing.

I believe KW Rocketry works just fine in 0.90 (at least it does for me).

Seems most other users are using it just fine as well: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014/page209
